## Load libraries

```{r}
#| label: packages
#| echo: true
#| eval: true
#| message: false
#| warning: false

require(Seurat)
require(tidyverse)

```

### Load data

```{r}
#| label: load data
#| echo: false
#| eval: true

seu_PBMC <- read_rds("../data/2024-11-22_seurat_obj_PBMC.rds")
seu_WB <- read_rds("../data/2024-10-17_seurat_obj_WB.rds")

DefaultAssay(seu_WB) <- "RNA"
Idents(seu_WB) <- "cell_type"

DefaultAssay(seu_PBMC) <- "RNA"
Idents(seu_PBMC) <- "cell_type"
```
